summary.span: 表示一个控件，该控件可让用户通过沿 移动 控件从一个值范围中进行选择。

span.span: Represents a control that lets the user select from a range of values by moving a control along a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个控件允许用户从一系列值中选择一个值。A control lets users select a value from a range of values. 下图显示的示例控件。The following illustration shows an example of a control. **滑块控件的示例****Example of a Slider Control** ![滑块图](~/add/media/genericslider.png "滑块图")![Slider illustration](~/add/media/genericslider.png "Slider illustration") 你可以自定义通过设置其属性的控件。You can customize a control by setting its properties. 以下列表介绍了一些属性的，可以自定义：The following list describes some of the attributes of a that you can customize: - 方向，水平或垂直。The orientation of the , either horizontal or vertical. - 沿刻度线位置跟踪。The tick mark locations along the track. - 若要显示的当前值的工具提示显示。The display of tooltips to show the current value of the . - 能力任一管理单元与刻度或沿的任意点放置到。The ability of the to either snap to tick marks or to be positioned at any point along the . - 增加此过程的值的方向。The direction of increasing value along the . 详细了解如何自定义控件，请参阅单个成员。For more information about how to customize a control, see the individual member. 重写元数据的属性，并设置其默认值为 10。 overrides the metadata of the property and sets its default to 10. 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)。For more information, see [Dependency Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果的值是进行动画处理，用户可能不再能够与之交互控制动画完成后。If the value of the is animated, the user may no longer be able to interact with the control after the animation finishes. 请参阅[如何：设置该属性后进行动画处理使用演示图板](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-set-a-property-after-animating-it-with-a-storyboard.md)有关如何还原的用户控件的选项进行动画处理后。See [How to: Set a Property After Animating It with a Storyboard](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-set-a-property-after-animating-it-with-a-storyboard.md) for options of how you can restore user control of a after it is animated. ## 自定义滑块控件Customizing the Slider Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用到多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 可以修改默认为控件提供唯一外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和状态的特定于，请参阅[Slider 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/slider-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [Slider Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/slider-styles-and-templates.md). 该控件的依赖关系属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果属性设置为默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值时该控件将出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题使用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将绑定的属性到的控件。The following examples shows how to bind the property of a to the of a control. 下面的示例定义控件名为`RectangleHeight`，可能会有介于 0 到 200 之间。The following example defines a control that is named `RectangleHeight` that can have a between 0 and 200. [!code-xaml[SliderwithDataBinding#Minimum](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/SliderwithDataBinding/CS/Pane1.xaml#minimum)] 下面的示例演示如何定义绑定其属性设置为的控件。The following example shows how to define a that binds its property to the of the control. (在完整的示例中，为创建一个类似的绑定属性。)(In the complete sample, a similar binding is created for the property.) [!code-xaml[SliderwithDataBinding#BindingRectangle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/SliderwithDataBinding/CS/Pane1.xaml#bindingrectangle)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在按下 时是否显示包含 的当前值的工具提示。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a tooltip that contains the current value of the displays when the is pressed.

summary.span: 如果显示工具提示，此属性还指定工具提示的位置。

span.span: If a tooltip is displayed, this property also specifies the placement of the tooltip.

value.span: 值之一，该值确定用于显示与 的 相关的工具提示的位置，或指定不显示工具提示。

span.span: One of the values that determines where to display the tooltip with respect to the of the , or that specifies to not show a tooltip.

value.span: 默认值为 ，该值指定不显示工具提示。

span.span: The default is , which specifies that a tooltip is not displayed.

summary.span: 获取或设置在工具提示中的 的 的小数点右侧显示的小数位数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of digits that are displayed to the right side of the decimal point for the of the in a tooltip.

value.span: 工具提示中显示的 的精度，由小数点右侧显示的小数位数指定。

span.span: The precision of the that displays in the tooltip, specified as the number of digits that appear to the right of the decimal point.

value.span: 默认值为零 (0)。

span.span: The default is zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值必须为非负整数。The value of this property must be a non-negative integer. 如果此属性设置为非负整数以外的值，则会发生异常。If this property is set to a value other than a non-negative integer, an exception occurs. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. summary.span: 获取或设置增加值的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the direction of increasing value.

value.span: 如果增加值的方向向左（对于水平滑块）或向下（对于垂直滑块），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the direction of increasing value is to the left for a horizontal slider or down for a vertical slider; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值确定的增大值的方向。The value of this property determines the direction of increasing value of a . 例如，移动控件上垂直时属性设置为`false`，则的会增加。For example, when you move the control up on a vertical when the property is set to `false`, the of the increases. 如果的值属性更改为`true`，则的会随着向上移动。If the value of the property is changed to `true`, the of the decreases as the moves up. 此属性将绑定到属性它实现的控件。This property binds to the property for the control that it implements. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. member this.IsMoveToPointEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否立即将 的 移动到在鼠标指针悬停在 轨道的上方时鼠标单击的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the of a moves immediately to the location of the mouse click that occurs while the mouse pointer pauses on the track.

value.span: 如果 立即移动到鼠标单击的位置，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the moves immediately to the location of a mouse click; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为`false`和鼠标单击发生沿离开，则单击鼠标的方向移动。When this property is set to `false` and a mouse click occurs along the away from the , the moves in the direction of the mouse click. 而不是立即移动到鼠标单击的位置，移动的距离由定义属性的每个鼠标单击。Instead of moving immediately to the mouse click location, the moves a distance that is defined by the property for each mouse click. 多个鼠标单击的效果，可以通过按住鼠标左键直到模拟重定位至所需的位置。The effect of multiple mouse clicks can be emulated by pressing and holding the left mouse button until the is repositioned to the desired location. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[Slider#SelectionRange](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Slider/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#selectionrange)] [!code-vb[Slider#SelectionRange](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Slider/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#selectionrange)] [!code-xaml[Slider#SelectionRange](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Slider/xaml/window1.xaml#selectionrange)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 并属性定义选择范围，并且必须设置为选择范围时，需要显示设置为`true`。The and properties define a selection range and must be set for the selection range to appear when is set to `true`. 下图显示与定义的选择范围。The following illustration shows a with a selection range defined. **定义为滑块控件的选择范围****A selection range defined for a Slider control** ![滑块选择范围](~/add/media/sliderselectionrange.GIF "滑块选择范围")![Slider selection range](~/add/media/sliderselectionrange.GIF "Slider selection range") 此属性绑定到属性的它实现的控件。This property is bound to the property of the control that it implements. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[Slider#SelectionRange](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Slider/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#selectionrange)] [!code-vb[Slider#SelectionRange](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Slider/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#selectionrange)] [!code-xaml[Slider#SelectionRange](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Slider/xaml/window1.xaml#selectionrange)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否自动将 移动到最近的刻度线。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性是`true`，此实现将移动到鼠标的位置单击。When the property is `true`, this implementation moves the to the location of the mouse click. 此实现将标记事件处理的设置属性的事件数据`true`。This implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true`. 该事件通过此方法处理这样的控件的不处理该事件。The event is handled by this method so that the controls of the do not handle the event.

para.span: 如果重写，均应调用基实现你实现。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 无法调用基实现可防止基类处理具有类处理程序，这可能会改变最终类的运行时行为的事件。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 您可以调用基实现之前或之后应用特殊处理，具体取决于您的要求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.
